Hello, I'm Avazov Jasur.

I am an 18 year old man with 2 years of experience who is passionate about creative work and loves to learn. I have experience of working in teams and consider myself a full stack programmer. In addition, I speak Russian, Uzbek and English.

On my portfolio website, I will showcase my work and provide insights into my skills and achievements. Stay tuned for updates and feel free to explore my projects and get to know me better.
